headline.main: From Arizona Revolution in Sonora--Death of Jack Powers.

docs.lead_paragraph: The revolution in Sonora progresses slowly, but with great destruction to life and property. About ten days since 200 Yaguies were killed by the Pesquiera troops under CACHORA. It appears that the party known as the Ganiora party, after they entered the State, received large additions to their force, until they numbered over two thousand men.
